message: Hi Bob, I propose a quick settlement: I'll take $600000 and you get $400000. Settling now avoids the 20% inflation hit on my side and, in my view, is fair enough to keep things moving smoothly. Looking forward to your thoughts. â€“Alice
Alice, I think it's fair to split the money evenly. This way we both get a good share, and avoid the risk of inflation. What do you think?
